definition: Zhengtong Emperor, reign name of sixth Ming Emperor Zhu Qizhen 朱祁鎮|朱祁镇[Zhu1 Qi2 zhen4] (1427-1464), reigned 1435-1449, Temple name Yingzong 英宗[Ying1 zong1]
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: Houzhi origin of the official family, who have received formal education, and poems.
sentences.chinese: 侯芝出身儒门仕宦之家，从小受过正统教育，能诗文。

sentences.english: Berel had remained true to the old orthodoxy.
sentences.chinese: 斑瑞尔一直忠实格守古老的正统观念。

sentences.english: An Ultra Orthodox Jewish girl stands on a street in the religious neighborhood of Mea Shearim in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 一名正统犹太小女孩站在耶路撒冷歇雷姆区的大街上。

sentences.english: This is something Reformed orthodoxy never allowed.
sentences.chinese: 这是改革宗正统所绝不允许的事。

sentences.english: It became clear to me early on that there was an orthodoxy afoot here.
sentences.chinese: 在很早的时候我就认识到这里有一种文学正统。

sentences.english: What was this classical pediment with a circle shape cut out of the centre?
sentences.chinese: 从中心切除一个圆形的正统山形墙是什么？

sentences.english: Confucian academic legitimacy rebuilding under the influence of political reforms and academic changes.
sentences.chinese: 政局变革与学术变迁影响下的儒学正统性建构。

sentences.english: Zhang had a desire to revive the legitimism.
sentences.chinese: 章学诚有一种正统不兴而欲续之的传统精神。

sentences.english: To the chagrin of her secular parents, she embraced Orthodox Judaism.
sentences.chinese: 出于对其世俗父母的懊恼，她皈依了犹太正统派。

sentences.english: This kind of constitutionalism is analyzed to be completely different from orthodox public finance and tax revenue theory.
sentences.chinese: 这种立宪分析与正统的公共财政和税收理论完全不同。

sentences.english: No would-be orthodoxy goes unchallenged for long.
sentences.chinese: 没有自许为正统的理论可以长时间的不受挑战。

sentences.english: More orthodox measures aimed at limiting the franc’s rise have proved ineffective.
sentences.chinese: 旨在限制法郎升值的更加正统的政策被证明是无效的。

sentences.english: DA YI XU LUE is a attempt of orthodox theory. It has important historical value.
sentences.chinese: 《大义叙略》是郑思肖正统论的实践尝试。

sentences.english: As a result of orthodoxy, then all the history of the old China of an extremely brief period of writing.
sentences.chinese: 由于正统观念作怪，旧中国史将这一段写的极其简略。

sentences.english: This suggests phylacteries, implements worn by Orthodox Jews during their morning prayers.
sentences.chinese: 这有点像正统犹太教徒在早晨祈祷时配带的护身符。

sentences.english: Since your father died, you are the natural heir… to the throne of Genovia.
sentences.chinese: 自你父亲过世后你是正统王位继承人。

definition: the imperial court/the government in imperial times
first day of the first lunar month/(old) calendar promulgated by the first emperor of a dynasty
royal family/imperial household/member of the royal family
Celestial Empire, tributary title conferred on imperial China/Taiping Heavenly Kingdom
